jd: Job Description -job: program managerjob type:hybridduration:6+monthsNeed Local fits WITH Healthcare Background Location:Hybrid Irving, TXNeed Local fits WITH Healthcare Background seeking a Program Manager local to Dallas, TX to join a Fortune 100 Healthcare organization. This team is responsible for a large Terradata platform supporting all business units, and is in the process of completing a large migration from Terradata into GCP. The team is seeking a Program Manager to assist in delivery of this project. This individual will be assigned to 3-4 different projects, and will be responsible for meeting with stakeholders and high level leadership to understand project requirements, leading PI planning, coming up with stories and working with team leads to ensure delivery of each portion of the project.Required Skills and Experience *- 6+ years of experience as a Program Manager, specifically managing and delivering on enterprise level projects end to end.- Experience with Jira as project tracking tool- Excellent communication and presentation skills- Experience with Rally, or relevant tool- Well versed in Agile methodologyHealthcare background
